content:
Yee~ I just observed Mors meticulously tending to
the creatures you collected for him.
He was so absorbed that he even set aside his lunch and forgot about it entirely.
info: 幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: So they decided to observe ants instead, What an interesting pair of people... Hm? Who's the other person, you ask? Well...
info: 幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content: Yee~ Her car is remarkably sturdy indeed.

content:
Once I saw Sani encouraging Glenn
to lift up Mobai's hair while he was dozing off,
just to see how big his eyes were...
info: 幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
My first impression of Sani was her adorable pink ears,
My second impression was her professional and efficient driving posture,
And my third impression...
info: 幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
Sometimes at the Academia, I'd see Mors and others lying on the grass,
I thought they'd dropped their lunch,
but actually, the ants had targeted and carried away their lunch from the chairs!
info: 幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
I often notice a large tail swishing past
among those cargo boxes in the plaza...
Glenn is working quite diligently at stacking boxes.
info: 幻雪关于御三家闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1
